# Read App Category Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get a specific app category.

## Reading App Category Information

- **Read the Parent Information of an App Category**: Get the App Store category to which a specific subcategory belongs.
- **GET /v1/appCategories/{id}/relationships/parent**

items.description: Get the App Store category to which a specific subcategory belongs.
